Text:
Good but unfortunately a few problems here:

1. The transmission goes blocky every now and again. That could however be coming from the transmission of the station and not from the encoding.

2. Sound level problems again.... the sound in Window Media Player is so soft even at 100% that you almost cannot hear it.

I need episodes 11 and 12 from this series, could you please help out? I would really appreciate it. 11 isn't even listed on tpb. Thanks in advance if you are able to help out.

I hope to be able to get the rest of this season downloaded soon so I can watch it all.
